actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of retained mineral rights by the United States to private surface landowners who acquired their land from a Federal land bank, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the conveyance of retained mineral rights by the United States to private surface landowners who acquired their land from a Federal land bank, and to those who hereafter buy land from a Federal land bank.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of retained mineral rights by the United States to private surface landowners who acquired their land from a Federal land bank, and for other purposes.
